risk_factors: Lack of specific menu item information to assess cross-contamination risks.
Uncertainty regarding dedicated gluten-free preparation areas.
Unknown staff knowledge regarding celiac disease and cross-contamination prevention.
recommended_actions: Exercise caution - moderate risk for gluten allergies
Speak with server/manager about allergen handling
safe_menu_items: Due to data limitations, specific safe alternatives cannot be identified. Requesting a gluten-free menu and inquiring about preparation methods is essential before ordering.
relevant_review_excerpts: [gluten]: Ricc was my server and he was wonderful! With so many dietary restrictions I was so pleased to be able to enjoy a delicious gluten-free seed oil free burger here! The gluten-free bun was very moist and not at all dry, which is rare for gluten-free things

My friend was so beyond excited because the dumplings were gluten free and they haven’t had a dumpling in ages. Their joy and genuine excitement made my whole day.
